FileFormat.FormatDescription: LaTeX is a document preparation system for typesetting. It is widely used in academia for technical or scientific documents but can be used for other forms of publishing. LaTeX projects can contain multiple subdocuments which are linked to a Master Document.
FileFormat.ProvenanceName: Digital Preservation Department / The National Archives
FileFormat.ProvenanceDescription: Following up external submission. Signature submitted by representative of KeepIt project at Southampton University.

InternalSignature.SignatureNote: Looking for \documentclass tag in LaTeX document. Could potentially improve this by including a variant looing for a master document with an include tag, \include{file.tex}
